attributes.action: Follow the will of 17.4 million whom voted to leave. Leave means leave.
attributes.additional_details: We are under the belief that we live in a free and democratic society. However, the actions of the British parliament is showing, that we actually live in a dictatorship. The World is looking at the UK and if the will of the people is not full filled which is to leave the eu, then the UK will show the people of the World, that they live under a false democracy. You say that Saudi, Iraq, Iran, Russia, North Korea are dictatorships, full of mad men. However, I suggest that you look closer to home.
attributes.background:
On the 23rd of June 2016 people went to the polls, and in front of them, they had two choices. To remain or leave the EU.

The choices were very clear and very precise, even school Children would understand the question.

Leave means to leave everything, it did not mean to do the hokey cokey.
